alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 25 at 5:01PM EDT until September 26 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Albany NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Connecticut... Housatonic River At Stevenson Dam affecting New Haven and Fairfield Counties. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...From this evening to Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 PM EDT Monday the stage was 10.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.0 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Mon 4 pm: 10.1 Forecast: Mon 8 pm 11.0 Tue 2 am 11.0 Tue 8 am 10.0 Tue 2 pm 9.9 Tue 8 pm 9.8 Wed 2 am 8.9 Wed 8 am 8.5 Wed 2 pm 8.2 Wed 8 pm 7.5 Thu 2 am 7.3 Thu 8 am 6.6 &&
